creator: jrumney@altio.com
text:
The Cookie header is not being parsed according to RFC 2109 in 
org.apache.tomcat.util.RequestUtil.processCookies().

Specifically, Tomcat is not recognizing the comma as a seperator, as mentioned 
(for future compatibilty) in section 4.3.4 of RFC 2109. This "future" behaviour 
has been observed in a Java Applet running in Netscape 4.73 on Windows NT, 
running through Apache with mod_jk (ajp13), by calling 
URLConnection.setRequestProperty("Cookie", cookie) more than once in the applet.

Tomcat 4.0b5 appears to have the same problem in 
org.apache.catalina.util.RequestUtil.parseCookieHeaders().
